info.name: Vietnam International Commercial Joint Stock Bank
info.description: Vietnam International Commercial Joint Stock Bank provides various banking products and services to organizations and individuals primarily in Vietnam. The company offers current, business, and digi accounts; term, foreign term, and flexi deposits; savings; mortgage, new and used auto purchase, apartment, home refinancing, unsecured personal, working capital, and business investment loans; and short, medium, and long-term loans. It also provides treasury and insurance products; credit and debit cards; derivatives; and transaction banking, cash flow management, fund, lending, bank guarantee, and trade finance services. In addition, the company offers supply chain finance, collection, payment, liquidity management, forex, and ATM; and mobile, digital, and other banking services. Vietnam International Commercial Joint Stock Bank was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
